title: Library Management System
description: A comprehensive system developed to streamline library operations, including book cataloging, member management, borrowing, and returns. Features a user-friendly interface for librarians and a robust backend for data handling.

title: School Management System
description: An ongoing project to build an integrated school management platform. It aims to facilitate student enrollment, grade tracking, attendance management, and communication between teachers, students, and parents. Focus is on scalability and ease of use.

title: Sustainable Data Analyzer
description: A Python application designed to analyze energy consumption patterns of computing tasks, aiming to suggest more sustainable algorithms and hardware configurations. This aligns with my passion for sustainable technology.

title: Poetry Generator API
description: A Java Spring Boot backend API that generates short poetic verses based on user-provided keywords, exploring creative applications of programming and my love for poetry.
